description: Welcome to Victorian Bali Spa - a hidden gem located in the Heart of Auckland's CBD and Ponsonby. Whether you need a strong & hard-hitting result, you want pampering with a Signature massage & Facial. Or you want a Traditional Balinese oil Massage for yourself & your Partner - we can help you. We offer Balinese, Deep Tissue, Hot Stone & Relaxation Massages plus Facials We're passionate about making your experience at Victorian Bali Spa truly unforgettable with our Exclusive Services.

services.name: Traditional Balinese Massage
services.description: Traditional Balinese healing ritual. Relaxes tension areas using long flowing strokes and pressure point therapy.

services.name: Glowing Toes
services.description: Indulge in our luxurious Deluxe Spa Manicures or Pedicures, meticulously crafted to nourish and rejuvenate your hands and feet. Our expert technicians will begin with a relaxing soak, followed by a gentle exfoliation and hydrating mask to soothe and smooth your skin. We'll then shape and buff your nails to perfection, and finish with a beautiful polish or buff to add a touch of glamour to your look. Choose from our selection of premium products and scents to customize your treatment and leave feeling pampered and refreshed.

services.name: Deep Tissue Massage
services.description: Experience the healing power of deep tissue massage at our spa. Our skilled therapists use targeted pressure techniques to relieve tension and tightness in your muscles and connective tissues, promoting the healing of injuries, reducing chronic pain, and improving overall mobility. With a combination of firm pressure and slow strokes, our deep tissue massage will help you let go of stress and achieve deep relaxation. Whether you're looking to recover from an injury, manage chronic pain, or simply unwind after a long day, our deep tissue massage will leave you feeling rejuvenated and refreshed. Book your appointment today and discover the benefits of this transformative therapy.

services.name: Couple Massage
services.pricing: 60min - $230 for Two, 90min - $310 for Two, 120min - $460 for Two
services.description: Enhance your spa experience with a significant other. Relax and unwind enjoying your massage side by side.

services.name: Victorian Bali Spa Facial
services.description: Experience the ultimate in relaxation and rejuvenation with our Victorian Facial treatment. Our skilled estheticians use premium products one of America's No 1 Brand IMAGE Skincare and gentle techniques to purify and nourish your skin from within. The one-hour facial comprises a deep cleansing, gentle exfoliation, and luxurious massage of the face, neck, and shoulders. We'll then apply a customized mask for maximum hydration and a flourish of botanical-infused moisture. Unlock radiant and youthful skin with our Victorian 1 hour facial treatment and feel refreshed and revitalized afterward.

services.name: Bali Foot Massage
services.description: Put a Life back in your step with our ultimate treat for feet.

services.name: Body Scrub & Massage Package
services.description: Helps to improve the body oxidation by exfoliating and removing the dead cells from the body lives the body flawless and smooth. Let our professional therapist guide you through different scrub options such as green tea scrub and honey scrub perfect blend for the antioxidants.

services.name: Pregnancy Massage
services.description: Let our highly trained massage therapists guide you to the style of massage that targets and relieves common tension areas that may arise during pregnancy. Relax, unwind and rejuvenate under their care. Only available from 12 - 36 weeks.

services.name: Abhyanga (Ayurvedic Massage)
services.description:
For thousands of years, massage therapy has been used as a powerful tool in the healing process. The simple gesture of touch has the ability to transform both mental and physical conditions, easing pain and restoring balance to the entire body. The primary aim of this massage is to flush out toxins that accumulate in our bodies due to the stress of everyday living, improper diet, and negative emotions, which can drain us both physically and mentally. Your experienced therapist will use warm medicated oil and specific strokes relevant to your body's constitution.

Benefits of Abhyanga:
- Promotes circulation and stimulates the lymphatic system.
- Relieves tightness and stiffness in the body, improving circulation.
- Moves the lymph, aiding in detoxification.
- Nourishes the whole body and stimulates internal organs.
- Improves sleep and promotes relaxation.
- Eliminates impurities from the body.
- Delays aging, improves complexion and life span.
- Rejuvenates.

services.name: Signature Massage
services.description: Using Swedish massage techniques, the Victorian signature massage focuses on holistic relaxation. Long, flowing strokes help relax the body and mind while easing muscle tension and facilitating circulation throughout the body.

services.name: Mini Mani or Pedi
services.description: Short on time? Our express mini mani or pedi treatments are the perfect solution for busy individuals who still want to keep their nails looking their best. In just 30 minutes or less, our skilled technicians will file, shape, and buff your nails, pushing back cuticles and applying a beautiful polish of your choice. You'll leave our spa feeling refreshed and polished in no time, ready to take on whatever the day throws your way.

services.name: Hot-Stone Massage
services.description: Heated volcanic stones glide over the body, melting away unwanted tension guiding you to a deep state of relaxation.

services.name: Express Facial - Image Skin Care
services.description: Unwind with our express facial treatments with America's No 1 Brand IMAGE Skincare, perfect for those with a busy schedule. Our experienced estheticians will gently cleanse and exfoliate your skin, followed by a relaxing massage of the face and neck. We'll then apply a hydrating mask and moisturizer, leaving your skin refreshed and revitalized in just 30 minutes. Whether you're looking to rejuvenate your skin for a special occasion or just need a quick pick-me-up after a long day, our express facial treatment is the perfect solution.

services.name: Romantic Spa Package
services.description: Escape to a world of romance, relaxation, and luxury with our Romantic Spa Package. Treat yourself and your significant other to an unforgettable spa experience that begins with a private, candlelit couple's massage, with customized pressure and therapeutic techniques tailored to your needs. Savor a glass of champagne as we pamper you with our mini spa mani OR pedi treatments to beautify and revitalize your hands and feet. Finally, indulge in an exclusive Express facial treatment using high-quality, nourishing skincare products that will leave your skin refreshed and glowing. Our Romantic Spa Package is designed to delight the senses and rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul

services.name: Victoria's Exclusive Package
services.description: Treat yourself to our most indulgent spa package yet, Victoria's Exclusive Package. The ultimate in relaxation, this 3-hour spa experience begins with our signature Victorian Facial, re-hydrating & nourishing to restore a youthful appearance to tired skin. From there, you will receive the luxurious and soothing one-hour deep tissue massage. We then invite you to experience our deluxe spa mani OR pedi treatment, where our expert technicians will file, shape, and buff your nails, pushing back cuticles and applying a beautiful polish of your choice. Additionally, we'll pamper your hands and feet with an invigorating sugar scrub and deep moisturizing mask for some serious TLC. Complimentary wine and chocolates included to make your experience even more memorable.

reviews.name: Solana Rivas
reviews.review: Had the pleasure of seeing Loli at Bali Spa on a short trip to Auckland last week. I got two massages in three days! It was incredible. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: EliÅ¡ka H
reviews.review: Absolutely delightful! I visited  Victorian Bali Spa with my partner and it was a relaxing haven. The staff were welcoming and attentive. Our massage therapists  were incredibly skilled and we felt so relaxed. We left feeling  revitalized and pampered. Highly recommend this spa!

reviews.name: Tanya Dunstan
reviews.review: I booked a surprise mother daughter pamper pair treatment ðŸ¥‚ with foot massage and facial and it was amazing. The best customer service and best back massage ever.  1,000 thank yous!
